subcategories.name: RGB cameras
subcategories.what_is_covered: Monocular, stereo, multi-view, surround-view or panoramic cameras producing color frames; used for appearance-based perception.
subcategories.typical_examples: front/side/rear vehicle cameras, egocentric/wrist/head cameras, aerial/on-board cameras

subcategories.name: RGB-D cameras
subcategories.what_is_covered: Active or structured-light cameras that output synchronized color + depth images.
subcategories.typical_examples: Intel RealSense, Azure Kinect, panoramic RGB-D rigs

subcategories.name: Event (neuromorphic) cameras
subcategories.what_is_covered: Asynchronous sensors emitting per-pixel brightness changes with micro-second latency.

subcategories.name: Thermal / LWIR cameras
subcategories.what_is_covered: Passive long-wave IR imagers for temperature or night-vision cues.
subcategories.typical_examples: Thermal cameras, LWIR DoFP polarization cameras

subcategories.name: LiDAR
subcategories.what_is_covered: Spinning or solid-state laser scanners returning 3-D point-clouds.

subcategories.name: Time-of-Flight cameras
subcategories.what_is_covered: Pulsed or continuous-wave light cameras computing per-pixel range.

subcategories.name: Radar
subcategories.what_is_covered: mmWave / FMCW / 4-D imaging radars measuring range–Doppler or heat-maps.

subcategories.name: Joint & wheel encoders
subcategories.what_is_covered: Optical or magnetic sensors giving joint angle / wheel ticks.

subcategories.name: Force / torque sensors
subcategories.what_is_covered: Strain-gauge or multi-axis transducers measuring interaction forces.

subcategories.name: Vision-based tactile
subcategories.what_is_covered: Camera-in-gel sensors capturing high-resolution surface contact.

subcategories.name: Pressure / tactile arrays
subcategories.what_is_covered: Capacitive or resistive skins giving per-taxel pressure maps.

subcategories.name: Optical motion-capture systems
subcategories.what_is_covered: Infra-red camera networks tracking reflective markers.

subcategories.name: Wearable mocap devices
subcategories.what_is_covered: Marker gloves or body suits for fine human-pose capture.

subcategories.name: Radio-based positioning
subcategories.what_is_covered: Satellite or UWB transceivers returning global coordinates.

subcategories.name: Microphones / audio arrays
subcategories.what_is_covered: Mono or array microphones for speech / environmental sound.
